title: Analysis of polynomial with parameter part - c

content.question: Find the value of p such that the average value of f over the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> [ </mo> <mrow> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ] </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> is 1.

frqParts.text: Find the value of p such that the average value of f over the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> [ </mo> <mrow> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ] </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> is 1.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
